content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; fuel inventory contains coal (2 units) and furnace result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs for automation research; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 5832.
- ElectricityGroup with id=5832 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); neighbours: pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5) and (2.5, 24.5); fluid_box: []; fluid_systems: [].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds ~200 units of water at 15°; connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_systems: [20748].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_systems: [20748].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=20748; status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=20749; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=20750; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=20755; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=20754; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=20759; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=20758; status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=20761; status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System ID Mismatch:
   - Repeated connection attempts using varied fluid_system IDs [20404, 20447, 20490, 20533, 20576, 20619, 20662, 20705] failed to find an active PipeGroup. Validate the current pipeline configuration and ensure the fluid_system ID used for connection matches a working PipeGroup.
   - Update the method for tracking and selecting active fluid_system IDs to prevent redundant and unsuccessful attempts.

• Pipeline Stabilization Strategy:
   - Relying on a fixed 10-second delay for pipeline stabilization has not resolved connection issues. Incorporate dynamic checks that monitor real-time pipeline readiness before attempting subsequent connections.
